util

Class Loader

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.Loader

  • public final class Loader
extends java.lang.Object
    Load methods for gathering the conference information such as the deadline.
    Version:
    6/3/2014
    Author:
    Nick Ames, Richard Hemingway, Tim Loverin, Yeonil Yoo

    • Method Detail

      • loadConferenceList

        public static Conference[] loadConferenceList()
                                       throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                              java.io.IOException
        Loads all Conference from CONFERENCE_LIST_PATH and creates array of Conference class. This method is being called by LoginPanel to let user choose conference. If file is not found, let it throws exception and it's not being catched here.
        Precondition:
        Conference file must exist in order to load.
        Returns:
        Array of conference
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
